fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Bugs last until your target dies or is visited by an evil role.
- You will see what evil roles visit your target on the night your bug triggers. Any Town roles that are framed will appear as evil, and any evil roles that are disguised as Town will not appear to the bug.
- If your bugged target dies, you will learn all feedback your target received the night your target died.
